title: A+ only on 2/0/19 Sona support?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Image relevant. How does this happen? 

Granted I have mastery 6 on Sona and I understand that it gets harder to earn S grades at that rank but surely. SURELY. 

Not to mention i had 21/31 kill participation.

Can someone PLEASE explain why this system is so broken? I've gotten S's on far lower scores before.

EDIT: This was a normal game btw. Does that make a difference?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Apotheosis,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ayEHAxtJ,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-11-01T13:11:44.864+0000)
>
> Image relevant. How does this happen? 

It happens because you didn't perform to the highest quality of what players in your region in that role played.

Very simple. You have to do better.

For wards, warding, KP, and all the usual stuff can be improved. It's actually fairly hard to get an S grade on a support in a 20-25 minute game.
because cs u have none so it wont give u an S unless u do better so either take cs or take kills

No lol. Please don't CS as a support, regardless of what these people say.

It's often not enough. Your Kills and Assists should be usually above 20-25.

I'm not saying u should take take cs I'm saying the way the system work is that in takes into account your cs and when your a support an unless u have relic shield your shouldn't have a lot of cs so it makes it harder for u to get an S rank

Not true. The system takes into account the average cs earned by that champion

So in this case

the system would take into account the average cs of Sona players and base it on that. I got an S with sona 1/0/14 with 0 CS.
Also, the amount of wards you place contributes to the factor too. Place a ward every time it cools down.
as a support main i can tell you, the S+'s come from when you average cs of 2 per minute and have an 80% + kill participation (along with warding and all that other jazz).
Normal vs. Ranked makes no difference, the issue is with the average high score.
Sona tends to be used as a kill potential so on average the kills they get are higher. You did a good job though, the champion rank system is a little bit meh is all.
